name: Surviving with Android
body:
# Surviving with Android Code Repository

This repository contains the source code related to the posts published in [Surviving with android] (http://www.survivingwithandroid.com)

## Credits 
Author: _*Francesco Azzola *_ ([survivingwithandroid@gmail.com](mailto:survivingwithandroid@gmail.com))
